entry.title: Proposal to update BIP-32
entry.summary: On April 21, 2016 at 14:08, Marek Palatinus asked Sipa for his opinion on a potential backward compatible fix. Sipa replied that Marek's response to the original post was never received and requested that it be resent after determining what went wrong. Pavol "stick" Rusnak signed off with a friendly message and link to SatoshiLabs.com.
